scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:mcp:optional && npm run copy:mcp:optional
scripts.build:mcp: cd ../mcp-local-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:mcp:optional: npm run build:mcp || echo '⚠️  MCP build skipped (mcp-local-main not found - will use bundled version if available)'
scripts.copy:mcp:optional: node scripts/copy-mcp.js || echo '⚠️  MCP copy skipped (will use bundled version if available)'
